title: England's Eddie Jones on training 'spies' and All Blacks semi-final at Rugby World Cup – video
text:
Eddie Jones said his England side were being spied on during training in the run-up to Saturday's Rugby World Cup semi-final against the All Blacks in Yokohama. He said: 'There was definitely someone in the apartment block filming but it might have been a Japanese fan.'

Jones took the opportunity to ramp up the pressure on New Zealand, who are aiming for their third successive title. The England coach asked members of the media to put their hand up if they thought England could win. None did, which Jones said showed there was no pressure on his side.
description: The England coach asked members of the media to put their hand up if they thought England could win, and none did
